children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-k8s/2 [idle] active: Primary
  mysql-router-k8s/0 [idle] unknown:

test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-test-app/0 [idle] waiting:

AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.133  no       installing agent

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.159.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.159.8          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+cd85a84
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.159.10         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+cd85a84
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.159.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.159.11         Last written value=19941
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:26:57Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     172  10.152.183.89   no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.133  no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.55   no       Last written value=19941

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.159.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.159.8          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+cd85a84
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.159.10         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+cd85a84
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.159.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.159.11         Last written value=19941
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f4c4d1a4760>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f4c4d1a4760> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f4c4ce7d6c0>.model
